name: Webdom Domain Marketplace
description: Buy, sell, auction, and manage .ton domains and Telegram usernames on webdom.market

tools.name: webdom_search_domains
tools.description: Search and filter .ton domains and Telegram usernames on the marketplace

tools.name: webdom_domain_info
tools.description: Get detailed info about a specific .ton domain or username

tools.name: webdom_my_domains
tools.description: List domains owned by the agent's wallet or a specified address

tools.name: webdom_market_stats
tools.description: Get marketplace statistics, recent sales, top sales, and price history

tools.name: webdom_auction_history
tools.description: Get bid history for a specific auction

tools.name: webdom_buy_domain
tools.description: Purchase a domain listed at fixed price

tools.name: webdom_list_for_sale
tools.description: List a domain for sale at a fixed price

tools.name: webdom_create_auction
tools.description: Create an auction for a domain

tools.name: webdom_place_bid
tools.description: Place a bid on an active auction

tools.name: webdom_cancel_deal
tools.description: Cancel an active sale or auction

tools.name: webdom_dns_bid
tools.description: Bid on a native TON DNS auction (domain registration or expired domain)
